name: Rotato!
description:
Rotato - the twin stick shooter which uses only one joystick! Play using a keyboard or Joystick Controller and don't touch the blue bubbles.

Directions to play: 

Keyboard - WASD to move & Space to Fire
Joystick Controller - Left Stick to move & 'X' to Fire on DS4 

Note: Game runs bug free on Mozilla Firefox. 

Ps: An update with a scoring system is coming soon.

Enjoy!
